Description: Landscape with two kneeling angels adoring Christ Child sleeping in the Virgin's arms; coat of arms of Jacques de Hacqueville, President of the Parliament of Paris, in the lower margin Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: François de Poilly I
Published by: François de Poilly I
Curator's comments: The plate reproduces the left side of Annibal's Rest on the Flight into Egypt (Posner 142). For the print see Evelina Borea and others, 'Annibale Carracci e i suoi incisori', École française de Rome, 1986, p.240.
Bibliographic references: Lothe 1994 / L'Oeuvre Gravé de François et Nicolas de Poilly (310)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Nan Ino Cooper, Baroness Lucas of Crudwell and Lady Dingwall
In Memory of: Auberon Thomas Herbert, 9th Baron Lucas of Crudwell and 5th Lord Dingwall
